name: Hellsaw
description:
Keep the blood gauge from running out or it's game over!

Use the mouse to control the Hellsaw Imp.

Left mouse button speeds up the Hellsaw Imp's movement.

Enter BERSERK mode when 10 enemies have been killed!

BERSERK kills will fill the blood gauge more than regular kills.

Innocent bunny blood is not good for the Hellsaw! Avoid them!
